name: Living Paradox
description: You have an intimate sense for the flow of time, and you can use your power to manipulate it.  Activate this trait to spend learned insight.

name: Time Looped Knife Wound
description: You have suffered a time looped wound, forcing you to repeatedly endure the harm of an earlier wound.  Every 24 hours you are impaled by a non-existent knife.

name: Slowed Timestream
description: Your timestream remains slightly slower than baseline reality.  You act 10% slower.

name: Unstable Chronomancy
description: Your chronomantic powers have inherent instability.  While attempting to maintain them over long periods of time, your powers may randomly fail.
